title: Man.of.Steel.R6.LiNE.Audio.Sync.Fixed.Complete
description:
The audio is completely synced throughout the whole movie, I have took some time out of my day to fix the non-synced audio! I watched the whole movie and I could not find anymore scenes that were out of sync!

p.s. this version also has the official MoS OST during the credits and also the song 'Seasons' by Chris Cornell that played earlier in the movie at 25:07

This is my first torrent, so I Hope you guys like it
seed and enjoy!
